survey_name: Customer Satisfaction with Drone Delivery Services Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather customer feedback on the experience, reliability, and satisfaction levels with drone delivery services to identify areas for improvement and enhance service quality.

questions.question_text: How often do you use drone delivery services?
questions.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents.
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice question to assess usage frequency. Ensure the options cover all possible ranges clearly.

script.question_text: How often do you use drone delivery services?
script.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents.

questions.question_text: What types of items have you received via drone delivery? (Select all that apply)
questions.routing_logic: This question appears only if the respondent selects 'Rarely', 'Occasionally', or 'Frequently' in Q1.
questions.client_notes: Use a multi-choice question to identify common delivery items. Include an 'Other' option to capture additional responses.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox (MULTI_CHOICE). Include an open-text field for 'Other' responses.

script.question_text: What types of items have you received via drone delivery? (Select all that apply)
script.routing_logic: This question appears only if the respondent selects 'Rarely', 'Occasionally', or 'Frequently' in Q1.

questions.question_text: On a scale of 1 to 5, how satisfied are you with the speed of drone deliveries? (1 = Very Dissatisfied, 5 = Very Satisfied)
questions.routing_logic: This question appears only if the respondent selects 'Rarely', 'Occasionally', or 'Frequently' in Q1.
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale to measure satisfaction with delivery speed. Ensure the scale is labeled clearly.

script.question_text: On a scale of 1 to 5, how satisfied are you with the speed of drone deliveries? (1 = Very Dissatisfied, 5 = Very Satisfied)
script.routing_logic: This question appears only if the respondent selects 'Rarely', 'Occasionally', or 'Frequently' in Q1.

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for drone delivery services?
questions.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents who have used drone delivery services (selected 'Rarely', 'Occasionally', or 'Frequently' in Q1).
questions.client_notes: Use an open-ended question to gather qualitative feedback. Allow for detailed responses.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for drone delivery services?
script.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents who have used drone delivery services (selected 'Rarely', 'Occasionally', or 'Frequently' in Q1).

questions.question_text: How likely are you to recommend drone delivery services to others? (1 = Not at all likely, 10 = Extremely likely)
questions.routing_logic: This question appears only if the respondent selects 'Rarely', 'Occasionally', or 'Frequently' in Q1.
questions.client_notes: Use a numeric scale to measure Net Promoter Score (NPS). Ensure the scale is intuitive.

script.question_text: How likely are you to recommend drone delivery services to others? (1 = Not at all likely, 10 = Extremely likely)
script.routing_logic: This question appears only if the respondent selects 'Rarely', 'Occasionally', or 'Frequently' in Q1.
